platform.icon.picker.preview=Preview with: platform.icon.picker.loading=Loading
rendering.macro.iconPicker.name=Icon Picker rendering.macro.iconPicker.description=Select an icon within the XWiki icon set. rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.id.name=Id rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.id.description=DOM id of the input field where the picker will apply to rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.class.name=Class rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.class.description=CSS class of inputs where the picker will apply to rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.prefix.name=Prefix rendering.macro.iconPicker.parameter.prefix.description=Prefix to add before the name of the icon in the input field (default: "image:icon:")
